content.rendered:
Directed by Manu Ashokan

Written by Sanjay

Cast Tovino Thomas (Vishal Rajashekharan). Parvathy Thiruvothu (Pallavi Raveendran (as Parvathy)). Samyuktha Menon (Tessa). Asif Ali (Govind Balakrishnan). Siddique (Raveendran). Irshad (Advocate). Anarkali Marikar (Sarita D’Costa). Prathap Pothen (ATC Chief). Prem Prakash (Balakrishnan). Diwakar Dhyani (Instructor Classroom (as Diwakar Dhayani)). Bhagath Baby Manuel (Abhi). Sreeram Ramachandran (Deepak). Krishnakumar Menon (Vijay). Rajani Murali (Govind’s Mother). Nasser Latif (Judge). Preetha Pradeep (Pallavi’s Sister). Lakshmika Sajeevan (Air Hostess). Mathew Arun (Avinash). Suja Paris Long(Opthalmologist). Anil Murali (Advocate). Ajay Mathew (Co-pilot). Rahul Cb (Passenger)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Ratheena

Production Grahalakshmi Production. S Cube Film
